Prepare for the next Grand Arena Championship with this Relic Upgrade Pack. Each pack contains 1 card containing one of the following Relic material:

- 50% chance to get [b]12 Electrium Conductors[/b]

- 10% chance to get [b]6 Aeromagnifiers[/b]

Prepare for the next Grand Arena Championship with this Zeta Material Pack. This pack contains [b]Zeta Ability material[/b], [b]Omega Ability material[/b], and chance to get rare [b]Omicron Ability material[/b]. Chances are as follow:

- 50% chance to get 4 Zeta Ability material, 3 Omega Ability material
- 45% chance to get 6 Zeta Ability material, 6 Omega Ability material
- 5% chance to get 10 Zeta Ability material, 9 Omega Ability material, and 4 Omicron Ability material

-Purchase limit: 2
